```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
data<-read.csv("us.csv")
head(data)
```

```{r}
data %>% 
  filter(State=="MA") %>% 
  mutate(Year=substring(Start_Time,1,4)) %>% 
  group_by(Year) %>% 
  count()
```

```{r}
count <- c(820,875,827,691,2363,816)
mean(count)
sd(count)
```
